TopicTitle: Physics timewarp doesn't automatically switch to on-rails timewarp when above 70,000m around Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows | CPU: 3700x | GPU: 6750xt | RAM: 32

 

When a vessel moves above 70,000  meters, the option for greater than x3 time warp doesn't become available when using "." or "," to speed up or slow time.  Only when mouse clicking on the time warp does greater than x3 time warp become available. 

 

Edited December 24, 2023 by The Space Peacock
